world

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • world.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class World
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    World class is a subclass of Observable and implement Observer Interface add collection of places , things and people to the world set changes and update them to be obvious
    Author:
    nazi
